dialogues.text: At least let me pack up my work. There's priceless artifacts in there. If they get damaged...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke looks up at Aline. He gives a minute nod to Miles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you notice anything out of the ordinary, let me know immediately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline looks around at the Agents scanning the destruction caused by the creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think I want to know your definition of out of the ordinary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 103 The Lab is full of sleek, high-tech lab equipment and sta of the art computers. The room is lit with a HUMMING fluorescent light. Surgical equipment and various pieces high-tech machinery BUZZ by an autopsy slab. Surgical too are laid out on a table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pinkerton's body is laid out on the slab, face-down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer stands over Pinkerton's body. He holds a high-tec hand-held scanning device. The scanner is connected to a large monitor on a dolly next to the slab.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer holds the scanner a few inches above Pinkerton's body, passing it along the length of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The image on the monitor matches the movements of the scanner. It shows a real-time internal scan of Pinkerton' body, displaying the skeleton, internal organs, and so on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Visible on the monitor is a spinal worm curled up tight around Pinkerton's spine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer doesn't look up, but his tone suddenly changes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You shouldn't be here, Carnby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby stands in the doorway. He waves Burke's I-D card.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not here. Commander Burke is. Now what the hell is that thing inside him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your curiosity have anything to do with the fingerprint of yours I found on his corpse?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The list of people I trust is short, Fischer. Is it about to get shorter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer turns back to Pinkerton's body. Carnby comes up a stands next to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer takes a scalpel off the table and makes a careful incision along Pinkerton's back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you I-D'd him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we got dentals. Agent James Pinkerton. He's ex-713.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was an agent? When?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Using tongs, Fischer peels back the skin of Pinkerton's b The spinal-worm is attached to Pinkerton's spine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Went MIA twenty years ago. Presumed dead. I'm trying to get more intell, but his records are so classified, they're practically invisible.

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: arnby takes the tongs from Fischer, holding open the skin Fischer makes a series of incisions with the scalpel, disconnecting the spinal-worm from Pinkerton's spine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's fused with his nervous system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never seen this kind of symbiosis before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer pulls the spinal-worm out of Pinkerton's open bac with a pair of tongs. It hangs limply, motionless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spinal-worm is long and thick, covered with hard, dar scales. It has dozens of tiny clawed feet that were conne to Pinkerton's spine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ischer drops the spinal-worm in a tub.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ischer notices the hand-held scanning device is BEEPING faintly, still registering something. He looks at the rea out, curious, then concerned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scanner's still reading something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer runs the scanner over Pinkerton's corpse. Nothing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now Fischer looks even more concerned. He turns the scann on himself, running it up and down his torso. Nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer looks at Carnby. Carnby gets it. It might be him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer runs the scanner over Carnby's torso. The scanner immediately starts BEEPING louder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They exchange a look between them. Something's inside Car

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline sits at her desk, analyzing the 3-D scan she made o the lynchpin artifact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Abkani never cease to amaze me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: line turns, startled, to see Hudgens standing behind her. Hudgens demeanor is friendly, reassuring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Such a complex society at a time when most of humanity was still hunting and gathering and huddling around fires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Hudgens. When did you get back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A few hours ago. I heard there was some excitement. Are you alright?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm fine. A bit shaken up. But fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I apologize for snapping at you earlier. Now, what are you still doing here after all you've been through?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens cranes his neck to see Aline's computer screen. H eyes light up when he sees the scan of the lynchpin artif

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you get that image?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline hesitates. Hudgens looks curious, friendly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a major find. I'll need to analyze it. Confirm its authenticity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can do that myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That wasn't a request...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens stands up to his full height, suddenly menacing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is the artifact?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everything okay in here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Cheung stands at the door, still wearing her full 7 combat gear. Her visor is up. She casually holds her rifl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you are?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ms. Cedrac's security detail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My dear, do you have any idea who I...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (interrupting) Dr. Lionel Hudgens. Former agent, sci-and- spy division. Currently 713 advisor status. I know exactly who you are. But I'm not your "dear" anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens looks back at Aline and smiles warmly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll just have to hold off my curiosity until morning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline smiles stiffly. Hudgens moves to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dr. Hudgens... I forgot to ask. Did you find the Erebus this time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens turns back and gives Aline another smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just an empty shipwreck. You were right. It was another wild goosechase.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens exits quickly. Aline and Agent Cheung watch him g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since when do I have a security detail?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since it seemed like you needed it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 104 Carnby lies on a bed with his shirt off. Fischer runs the hand-held scanner over Carnby's torso. He looks at the results of Carnby's scan on a monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A spinal worm is visible around Carnby's spine. But it lo different than the others. It is small and shriveled and seems barely attached to the spine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's one inside you too. But the symbiosis is incomplete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you remove it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I could try. But it might paralyze you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline sits at her computer, checking out 3-D scans of the four Abkani artifacts. She is running an analysis the sym carved into each artifact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Streams of calculations run across the screen as the comp processes. The computer BEEPS as it comes to a conclusion The symbols correlate to constellations in the night sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline hits COPY on her computer and it burns a CD of the information she has processed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline searches through a roll of maps. She pulls out a ma North America and lays it out on a work station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline draws lines across the map, trying to pinpoint a location based on the constellations. She marks the map u with latitude and longitude calculations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stops. She looks back up at the computer screen. She her pen on the map. She looks frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's missing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The computer BEEPS again. The CD copy has been made.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline rolls up the map and starts to pack up her belongin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 107 Fischer and Carnby stand in front of an open armory cabin Sleek 713 assault rifles are lined up on a rack beside th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They stand on either side of a counter. A large monitor i the wall behind them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not much for coincidences. These organisms must be connected to those things from the museum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We call them xenomorphs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Catchy. When did they first appear?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a remote control, Fischer clicks through images on t monitor as he talks. He brings up a series of anatomical schematics of the xenomorph creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two years ago. They've been 713's top priority ever since. But it's been almost exclusively in rural areas. This kind of urban infiltration is unprecedented.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you isolated any weaknesses?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer brings up an image of the periodic table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Most metals pass right through them. So normal bullets and blades are useless. But they're vulnerable to elements 76 to 79. Osmium, iridium, platinum, and gold. Negates their ability to disrupt electricity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If they disrupt electricity, why did my flashlight still work?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The closer the current to its power source, the less disruption.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer takes a hand-held para-meter scanning device off rack. It is a sleek, updated version of Carnby's para-met similar to the Agents' rifle-mounted scanners.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is calibrated to track their disruption field. It won't help you see them, but you'll know when they're nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer brings up a computer simulations of the creatures disruption field, displaying how it works.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They live almost exclusively in darkness. Sunlight's lethal in large doses. But only certain light frequencies hurt them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer takes a rifle off the rack and lays it down on th counter in front of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Off another rack, Fischer picks up a lamp. He flips it on off, shining the bright blue beam around. Fischer snaps t lamp into place at the top of the rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These lamps are set to an effective frequency.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer takes out several magazines of ammo out of the cabinet. He discharges a bullet. It glows yellow in his h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But for maximum damage, we use bullets coated in a photon-accelerated luminescent resin. Cuts right through them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer hands the rifle and a magazine to Carnby. Carnby loads the magazine and checks the rifle like a pro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm going to need a lot of those.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 115 Carnby unlocks the multiple locks on the front door to hi Loft and enters. He carries a heavy duffle-bag. He looks exhausted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warily, Carnby holds out the hand-held scanner, checking see if it registers anything. But the Loft reads clean.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby puts the scanner down on a counter and allows hims to relax as he enters the Loft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby walks in slowly, a man whose adrenaline is wearing and is only now feeling the pain. He shrugs off his trenc coat and lets it drop on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He drops the duffle-bag on the floor. He kicks off his bo He pulls off his holster and gun and drops them on a tabl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby takes out the lynchpin artifact. He puts it down o work station in the lab area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby pulls off his shirt. His back is marked with old s and fresh bruises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby walks over to his bed. He drops down onto the bed. body sinks down, finally relaxing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Five minutes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby falls fast asleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 116 Fischer sits at his computer. He is going through the Bur 713 database. He pulls up Pinkerton's file. A red CLASSIF sign flashes onscreen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer types in a password. CLASSIFIED flashes again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer turns to see Agent Miles standing at the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commander Burke wants to see you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens walks through a dank cement room. Various pieces scientific equipment sit in a corner. Shelves are lined w ancient artifacts, small sculptures, and masks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens stops at a work station and pauses. A look of pai crosses his face. He winces, holding it in. He steadies himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the other side of the Lab is a large recess in the spa The opening is covered by thick cage bars covered in gold The cage appears to be empty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But suddenly, an invisible creature SLAMS into the bars o the cage, trying to lunge at Hudgens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As it hits the bars, fingers of electricity jolt through making it visible for a split second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens watches calmly. He goes to a small dial built int the wall beside the cage. Hudgens turns up the dial.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the cage, jagged bolts of electricity jolt around the invisible creature. It SQUEALS and HISSES from the electricity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finally, the creature collapses and fades visible. The creature is unconscious, but still alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens turns the dial back down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens picks up a hypodermic syringe from a counter next the cage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He injects the syringe into the creature's neck, between of its scales. He withdraws a syringe-full of the creatur black, sticky blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He goes back to the work station, rolling up the sleeve o his shirt. His arm is pocked with injection marks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens ties off his arm, preps a vein, and injects himse with the syringe of creature's blood. He closes his eyes, feeling the substance flow into him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 117 Aline walks up to an imposing, slightly decrepit-looking brick building in a bad area of town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes to press the buzzer, but the box is broken, the wires limply hanging out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She KNOCKS on the door. No answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stops, annoyed. But then a slight, involuntary smile comes across her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline fishes in her purse and pulls out a set of keys. Sh finds the key she's looking for and slips it into the loc the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pauses for a moment, then turns the key.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 119 Aline enters the Loft. She looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline closes the door behind her. She takes another few s into the Loft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She spots Carnby's discarded trench-coat on the floor. Sh walks up and picks it up with two fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see nothing's changed...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline hangs the coat on a hook. She enters the Loft prope looking around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline stops. She sees Carnby lying on his bed, asleep. Sh smiles. He looks peaceful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline sees the lynchpin artifact sitting in the lab area. unpacks her bag, taking out three items wrapped in cloth. places the three items next to the lynchpin artifact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She looks over at Carnby, sleeping in his bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline kicks off her shoes and walks over to the bed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She climbs onto the bed, careful not to disturb Carnby. H stirs a little, but he doesn't wake up. Aline lies down n to Carnby on the bed. She notices the new scars and bruis along his back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline lays her head on a pillow. Their faces lie close together. She watches Carnby sleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline leans over and gives Carnby the lightest of kisses. doesn't wake up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sweet dreams...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline's eyes flutter closed, then open, then closed again Within seconds, she's asleep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke stands behind Krash at the monitor banks, surveying incoming information.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Miles holds the door open as Fischer enters. Miles stands at the door, listening. Burke doesn't face Fischer

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you been meeting with Carnby?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. He's got intell we need. And I trust him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke turns around to face Fischer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to trust each other, Fischer. Are you with us or not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer weighs his answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you need from me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All the intell you've got on Edward Carnby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Kitchen is comfortable, lived in. Fischer's suit jack hangs on the back of a chair. His revolver and holster al hang on the chair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer's wife, SARAH FISCHER (early 50s) stirs the conte of a pot with a wooden spoon. Fischer makes a salad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What else could I do? I had to tell him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You did the right thing, Paul. From what you've told me, Carnby can take care of himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doorbell RINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get it. You stir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sarah hands Fischer the wooden spoon. She gives him a qui warm kiss. She exits the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sarah Fischer hurries to the front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She checks her appearance in a mirror in the Foyer. She touches her hair, purses her lips, and turns to the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She opens the front door, a pleasant expression on her fa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights in the Kitchen start to flicker. Fischer freez listening. The House is quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer dives for the revolver hanging in his holster on chair. He pulls a container of glowing bullets out of the pocket of his jacket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The container spills on the floor. He scrambles to pick u the bullets and load them into the revolver.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer edges to the Kitchen door, listening, anxious. Everything is quiet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He quietly pushes open the door, revolver ready. 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer creeps into the Foyer. The lights flicker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one is in the Foyer. The front door is open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sarah? Answer me! Sarah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No answer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something CRASHES to the ground in the Living Room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer quietly opens the door to the Living Room, grippi his revolver tightly. He steps into the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights in the Living Room are out. A broken lamp lies SMASHED on its side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer comes around the side of the couch. He stops, shocked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sarah Fischer's dead body lies in a pool of blood.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer is suddenly grabbed and SLAMMED into the wall. Th impact knocks several framed photos of Fischer and his Wi off the wall. They SHATTER as they hit the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer is PUNCHED in the face, hard. He is stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer is hurled over the couch. He lands heavily on a g coffee table, SHATTERING the glass tabletop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The impact knocks his revolver out of his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer lies dazed in the broken glass. He looks up at hi attacker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Hudgens, standing over him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens SLAMS his fist into Fischer's face. Fischer is no only semi-conscious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens pulls out a long, thin spinal-worm. Its many claw feet and razor-sharp jaws snap away, its segmented, scale body writhing in his grip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you can't beat us, Fischer, join us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens grabs Fischer by his hair and pulls his head back forcing his mouth open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We follow the spinal-worm as it enters Fischer's mouth, slipping down his throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We continue to follow the spinal-worm as it makes its way through Fischer's body, weaving through the twists and tu of his digestive system and internal organs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spinal-worm tears through layers of Fischer's insides finally making its way to his spine. The spinal-worm then wraps itself around Fischer's spine, its tiny clawed feet grabbing hold and attaching themselves along its length.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We move up Fischer's spinal cord to his brain. The spinal worm seems to be causing synapses to fire in chaotic burs We travel through Fischer's brain and out of his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer's expression is now calm. Hudgens regards Fischer looking pleased with himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something chases Young Edward as he runs for his life thr the misty, dark forest. He runs towards a light up ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Young Edward enters the Shed, closing the door behind him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small Shed is cluttered with equipment for repairing power lines. A large transformer module sits at the back the Shed. It HUMS and CRACKLES with electricity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something compels Young Edward to move closer towards the transformer and reach out a trembling hand. He places his hand against the transformer's front grill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a sudden SNAP and FLASH, electricity courses through Young Edward. Jagged fingers of blue light jolt around hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 124 It's night. The Loft is dark. Carnby and Aline are fast asleep on the bed, lying next to one another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby wakes up with a start. He tries to get his bearing Carnby looks surprised to see Aline lying next to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He quietly gets out of bed, letting her sleep. He pulls o fresh shirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby pads over to the lab area and turns on a desk ligh He sees the wrapped items Aline placed on his work statio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby unwraps the items. They are the three Abkani artif from the Museum.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby picks up the lynchpin artifact, turning it around. Something catches his eye. Carnby fiddles with the artifa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the artifact telescopes out. Instead of one thi ring, it is now three successively smaller rings, one pil on the other, with a common hollow middle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby picks up the large ring artifact. He slots it into place on the telescoped lynchpin artifact. Next, Carnby s in the medium and small rings into place.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The four pieces fit together perfectly, creating a cylindrical device with a small, round opening in the bot

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby cooks omelettes in the Kitchen area of the Loft. T ingredients are spread out on the counter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline wakes up. She sits up in the bed and looks around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something smells amazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline trots over to the Kitchen area as Carnby serves up omelettes. Aline gives him a look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I love omelettes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby sits down across from Aline. They eat while they t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I figured out a connection with the symbols on those artifacts. They correspond to constellations. But something's missing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe this will help...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby takes out the assembled Abkani device and puts it on the table between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline picks up the device, fascinated. She runs her finge over the Abkani symbols carved into the lynchpin artifact

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She goes to her bag and pulls out the map she was working and the CD. She hands Carnby the CD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you run the program on this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby goes over to his computer and inserts the CD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline spreads out the map. She draws lines across it, connecting up constellations with locations on the map. S writes out latitude and longitude calculations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline comes up to Carnby at the computer. The program is waiting for her calculations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leans past Carnby and enters the latitude and longitu numbers into the program. The computer processes the information. Hundreds of map images flash across the scre as the computer searches for a match.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are we looking for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Abkani used constellations to pin- point a geographical location. But I don't think I can isolate it closer than a hundred mile radius.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The computer finds a match. A specific map appears onscre with a 100 mile radius circle marked in the center of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Edward...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. That's us right there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby points to a spot on the onscreen map.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 127 Carnby puts the dishes from their meal into the Kitchen s The sink tap is RUNNING. Aline clears the dishes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The para-meter Fischer gave Carnby starts faintly BEEPING but the RUNNING sink tap covers the sound. Something is coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights in the Loft flicker once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby turns off the tap and they listen intently. They c hear the scanner BEEPING faintly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights in the Loft flicker and go out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline grabs the flashlight and switches it on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby runs to his revolver and holster. He checks the chamber in his revolver. The bullets glow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby looks up, sensing something. He spins around, read

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A FIGURE stands behind him. It is John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John looks fierce, his face drawn, gaunt. His eyes are su into dark recesses, with nearly clear irises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John lunges at Carnby. Carnby is too surprised to defend himself. John SLAMS Carnby against the wall, knocking his revolver out of his hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: John picks Carnby up and hurls him across the Loft. Carnb CRASHES through furniture as he lands heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of the shadows behind Aline, two FIGURES emerge. They both missing ORPHANS, one MALE, one FEMALE. They have the same gaunt faces and clear irises as John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby picks himself up. He spots the Orphans behind Alin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two Orphans lunge at Aline, but she's able to dodge o of the way. The Orphans are fast and fierce. Aline leaps forward, sliding across the floor towards Carnby's revolv

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs it and spins to face the two Orphans. They're g

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then the Female Orphan leaps out at her. Aline FIRES, hitting the Female Orphan in the shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Female Orphans jumps away, into the shadows. Aline scrambles to her feet, the revolver ready. But the Female Orphans has disappeared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline runs over to Carnby. He grabs a shotgun from the weapons cabinet and loads it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That looked like John.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is. The other two are from the orphanage as well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby pumps the shotgun. Carnby and Aline creep forward the darkness of the Loft. They listen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, John lunges at him, his teeth bared.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby SMASHES John across the head with the shotgun. But John keeps coming, SLAMMING him against the wall. Carnby breaks John's hold and swivel-kicks him out of the way. J skitters off into the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Female Orphan leaps out at Aline, trying to tear into with her teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby grabs a pipe leaning against the wall and runs for Aline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Male Orphan lunges out at Carnby. He SMASHES the Male Orphan across the face with the pipe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline struggles with the Female Orphan. Carnby turns to s John rising up behind her, about to strike.

dialogues.speaker: C
dialogues.text: arnby reacts instinctively. He FIRES, shooting John in th chest with a shotgun BLAST. John flails back, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Male Orphan jumps out at Carnby. Now working on insti Carnby spins and jams the pipe into his gut, impaling him The Male Orphan stumbles to the ground and dies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline gets away from the Female Orphan. As the Female Orp lunges at her again, Aline FIRES, shooting her three time the chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But it's only the third bullet, the one that hits the Fem Orphan dead center in the chest that takes her down. The Female Orphan falls back, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline comes up to Carnby. He stands over John's corpse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You had no choice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's controlling them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many are there altogether?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twenty. Including me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The para-meter starts BEEPING again, louder and more frenetic. The lights start to flicker, fading up and down

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby unzips the duffle-bag. It's full of 713 equipment given to him by Fischer. Carnby loads an assault rifle wi 713 magazines. He loads a pistol with the glowing bullets

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby throws Aline the pistol. She catches it in mid-air She checks it like a pro.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline and Carnby stand together, guns drawn, ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a moment of quiet. They listen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lights in the Loft flicker. The scanner BEEPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something SMASHES into the Loft's front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby grabs the para-meter. It BEEPS more insistently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The front door BURSTS open, knocked right off its hinges the invisible creature crashing through it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The invisible xenomorph creature's skewed, inhuman P.O.V. it looks across the Loft, searching. It locates Carnby an Aline and heads directly for them.

dialogues.speaker: A
dialogues.text: ll that is visible of the creature's trajectory is furnit being knocked aside as the creature rushes towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The creature SMASHES right through a glass-topped work ta SHATTERING it. Papers whirl around in its wake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline and Carnby stand their ground, facing the on-coming creature as it lunges towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline leap out of the way at the last moment. Rolling away in opposite directions, they simultaneously FIRE. Their glowing bullets hit the creature dead on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The creature SQUEALS, flashing visible from the multiple impacts. Their glowing bullets pierce the creature and it tumbles to the ground, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The creature's invisible corpse lies motionless. Broken furniture and shattered glass is everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby's para-meter is quiet, the readings subsiding with creature's death. The lights stop flickering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'd better get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, all the lights in the Loft go out in unison. Al the computer monitors also go dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scanner starts BEEPING frenetically. Electromagnetic readings shoot up, registering multiple sources nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline back up together, ready for an attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the first thing they hear isn't a creature. It's the sound of AUTOMATIC GUNFIRE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Streaks of glowing bullets fly through the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is a 713 unit, laying down suppressing FIRE as the Age enter the Loft through the broken front door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agents Barr, Cheung, and Marko enter, followed by five ot AGENTS. They all wear full 713 combat gear, their rifle- mounted lamps illuminated, their weapons in use.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby located.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krash monitors the 713 unit from the Control Room. Banks monitors stream data at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krash speaks into her head-set comm-link, cool and collec

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Multiple readings confirmed. Back-up's on the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agents FIRE glowing bullets through the dark Loft. Th are invisible creatures everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger that. We're hot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The muzzle FLASHES and glowing bullets pierce the darknes the Loft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: hadows swim through the space as the invisible creatures move around them, attacking the Agents with their razor-s claws and spiked-tails.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An invisible creature swoops out of the shadows towards a Agent, who is FIRING in the opposite direction. The creat whips past the Agent, slicing him open with a fluid slash its claws. The creature keeps moving directly for Carnby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline, standing together, FIRE their weapons i the darkness, oblivious to the creature rushing towards t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But at the last second, Carnby turns instinctively as the creature lunges at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline turn and OPEN FIRE on the creature. It flashes visible from multiple hits, flailing off into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Barr FIRES controlled bursts of glowing bullets int the dark Loft. He screams into his comm-link.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the hell's our back-up?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Landing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound of a HELICOPTER can be heard outside the Loft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another invisible creature skirts along the edge of a wal avoiding the GUNFIRE. It locates its target, an Agent FIR up at the ceiling. It races towards the Agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agent turns to the attack and tries to fire. But the creature is too fast. It SLAMS the Agent back against the wall and impales him with its spiked-tail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agents Barr and Cheung spot this and OPEN FIRE on the creature. It flails about, fading visible from the impact

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The creature tries to scurry away, but Barr and Cheung ar it. With precision and speed, they blow the creature away

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But more creatures attack. The fighting is fierce. Glowin bullets streak through the darkness. The Agents are calm determined as they engage the creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline hold their own, sticking together, SHOOT at whatever shadows move around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six AGENTS in full combat gear burst into the Loft. Leadi the unit is Commander Burke. Agent Miles is with him, as AGENT TURNER (mid-30s).

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke, Miles, Turner, and the other Agents immediately jo the battle, laying down suppressing FIRE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Agent carrying a rifle-mounted grenade-launcher FIRES incendiary flash-grenade at the Upper Level of the Loft. With a flash of blinding light, the grenade EXPLODES. Creatures SQUEAL as flames swoop up through the Upper Lev

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Glowing bullets fill the dark Loft. Creatures SQUEAL and flail from the hits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the darkness of the Loft, Carnby, Aline, and the Agent finish off the remaining invisible creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last creature goes down in a hail of glowing bullets. Agents strafe the creature's corpse to make sure it's dea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Barr and Carnby exchange a look between them. Barr clearly respects Carnby's abilities.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Loft is still dark. Barr's rifle-mounted scanner no longer registers any creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're clear, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke looks around at the remains of the battle. The Loft totally trashed. A small fire burns in the Upper Level.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Love what you've done with the place, Carnby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles runs a hand-held scanning device over John's corpse The scanner BEEPS, indicating the presence of a spinal-wo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, this one's infected too!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Turner scans the Female Orphan's corpse. His scanni device BEEPS. She has a spinal-worm too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got another one here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke immediately turns his weapon to Carnby. The red las sight makes a glowing dot on Carnby's chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Taking their cue from Burke, the other Agents in his unit train their weapons on Carnby. Several glowing red dots hover on his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop your weapon and get down on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's been infected with some kind of organism. He could be under its control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline turns to Carnby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's true. I've got one inside me. But it's not controlling me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll excuse me if I don't take your word for it. Now drop your weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby holds his weapon at his side. He doesn't drop it. he doesn't move either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline steps in between Carnby and the Agents. The red dot are now trained on her chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get out of the way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agents try to get a clear shot around Aline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not one of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I've got to shoot through you to get to him, I'll do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby looks up at the lights. They are still dark.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are the lights still out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barr consults his scanner. It isn't registering anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scanner's clear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krash?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Negative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forget to pay your power bill, Carnby?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Agent standing at the other end of the Loft hears something SHUFFLING behind him. He turns to look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something grabs the Agent, SLAMS him back against the wal and rips out his neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's another ORPHAN, with the same fierce, gaunt look and clear irises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke turns away from Carnby for a moment, trying to figu out what's happening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby suddenly lifts his weapon and points it at Burke. Burke sees this, but before he can react, Carnby FIRES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby's bullet WHIZZES past Burke and hits an ORPHAN dea center in the gut, sending him flailing back, dead. The Orphan was about to pounce on Burke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a moment as Burke and Carnby look at one another. Burke realizes Carnby just saved his life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ORPHANS attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are the grown-up Children from Carnby's Orphanage. L Pinkerton, they are difficult to kill, immune to pain, fa and deadly. They all have the same gaunt, wild look, with sunken eyes and nearly clear irises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Orphans leap out at the Agents, quick and fierce. The bite and claw and use their superhuman strength to throw around the Agents and tear them apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dark Loft is again lit up with glowing bullets, strea through the darkness. The Agents' rifle-mounted lamps shi around, but the effect is chaotic, disorienting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the Orphans attack, they make quick work of many of th Agents. Glowing bullets fly around everywhere. The SCREAM Agents being torn apart mix with BURSTS of AUTOMATIC GUNF

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline stay together, dodging the attacking Orphans, and FIRING into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Orphan rises up behind Carnby. He spins and SHOOTS her the side. But she just keep coming. Carnby SHOOTS the Orp again, this time dead center in the chest. The Orphan collapses, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby checks the corpse. The bullet came out the other s A mixture of red blood and black, sticky ooze drips from bullet hole right over the Orphan's spine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby grabs the comm-link off the body of a dead Agent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All Agents! You've got to kill the organism to stop them! Aim for the spine!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: cross the Loft, Burke listens to the comm-link.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Orphan is attacking Agent Miles. Burke takes careful a and SHOOTS the Orphan in the back, right on the spine. Th Orphan falls over, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Confirmed. Spinal shot's a kill shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With this information, the Agents quickly gain the upper- against the Orphans' attack. The Orphans are fast and dea but they have no organization. Now that the Agents have a handle on this new threat, their precision and speed retu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soon, the battle is over. Dozens of bodies of dead Agents dead Orphans lie littered around Carnby's destroyed Loft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only Carnby, Aline, Burke, Miles, Barr, Cheung, Marko, an Turner remain alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke's and Carnby's eyes meet. Burke approaches Carnby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other Agents all stand by, waiting for an order from Burke. Aline watches them, ready to step in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You remember the number one rule they teach you in 713 training? Trust your instincts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke and Carnby face off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer's missing. So is Hudgens. And I've got a situation brewing that makes this scrap look like a bar brawl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What does Hudgens have to do with this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I want to find out. I need you both to brief me in the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke turns to walk off, but then stops. He turns back to Carnby. Burke holds out his hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, and Carnby... I'll need my I-D back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby smirks. He pulls out Burke's I-D card and hands it back to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 134 A massive, long-abandoned structure built directly agains the face of a mountain. This is the Entrance Hall of Britannia Mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 713 AGENTS mill about, setting up perimeter defenses. Hum are being positioned as barricades. Large spotlights are being set up to illuminate the area, with power cables leading inside the Entrance Hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agents Barr, Cheung, and Marko are part of the team outsi setting up the defenses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The 713 helicopter carrying Carnby, Aline, Commander Burk and Agents Miles comes down for a landing next to two oth helicopters already sitting in front of the Mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The moment the helicopter touches down, Burke leaps out, barking into his comm-link. Carnby, Aline, and Miles exit after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krash! What are you reading?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: rash swivels in her chair, processing data, making adjustments to sensors, and checking out the information scrolling across the bank of monitors. She wears a head-s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're practically off the scale, Commander. This is unprecedented. Should I initiate Contingency Nine-Alpha?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The military? We don't have time to wait for them to mobilize.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that a negative, Commander?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke leads Carnby, Aline, and Miles to the Entrance Hall

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. Initiate Nine-Alpha on my authority. But I won't hold my breath. By the time this clears Defense Council, we'll be dead or drinking...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 135 Rusty construction vehicles, detritus, and rubble lie discarded throughout the Hall. Several shafts have been d into the mountain. Narrow paths lead up the slope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AGENTS scurry around, setting up the defense system. The position is set up just inside the entrance to the Hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke and Miles enter, followed by Aline and Carnby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got three perimeters of flash- mines. Gatling guns are set to electromagnetic motion tracking. And every available agent in the vicinity is here. But Commander...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know, Miles. But back-up won't make it before sunrise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several raised Platforms stand in the middle of the Hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On one Platform, Agent Turner helps two AGENTS unload a l gold-plated generator from the back of a Humvee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Generator will be on-line shortly, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke nods to Turner as he and the others walk by. Carnby Aline get into step with Burke and Miles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like you're going to war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We are. The highest xeno concentration on record is closing in on this location. This could be our chance to wipe them out once and for all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Tunnel, carved directly into the rock wall of the Mine, leads off into darkness. Carnby stares down at the Tunnel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to go down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming here for a reason. Until we know what they're after, we're never really going to be able to stop them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Miles consults his hand-held para-meter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something's definitely down there, sir. But there's too much interference to get a clear reading from here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles looks at Burke expectantly. Carnby and Aline watch as well. Burke looks conflicted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamn it. Miles, you're in charge of perimeter defense. Nothing gets in or out until we find out what's down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Batteries of flash-mines (mines that explode with a burst blinding light) set to electromagnetic sensors are being positioned in wide perimeters around the Entrance Hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Automatic gatling guns loaded with chains of glowing bull are set up at key points around the area. The gatling gun are mounted on swiveling robotic bases, able to automatic turn to face on-coming targets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: AGENT FEENSTRA (mid-30s) tests the motion sensor on one o the gatling guns with her hand. The gun swivels accuratel match the movement of her hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Feenstra nods to the two AGENTS standing behind the gatling gun. They tinker with its guidance system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 37 Carnby and Aline walk carefully down a pitch black tunnel illuminated only by their lights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Along with them are Commander Burke, and Agents Barr, Che and Marko. They each carry assault rifles with lamps moun on them. Their visors are down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been thinking about something. The Abkani prophecy. The shadows that make ghosts of men...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every culture has a story about the end of the world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But not every story starts to come true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Barr carries a hand-held para-meter. It's picking u high electromagnetic readings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's definitely this way, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They pass by various pieces of mining equipment, long sin discarded. Thick dust and cobwebs hang off the equipment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They make their way down the Tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 144 The Tunnel ends at a slightly larger, rounded Chamber wit walls of solid rock. They can't go any further. Cobwebs a thick dust hang everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby, Aline, Burke, Barr, Cheung, and Marko emerge out the Tunnel into the Chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a dead end.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Barr checks his para-meter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Readings are getting stronger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby looks around, sensing something. He wipes away som cobwebs and dust and runs his hand over the Chamber walls

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll double-back. Take another tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait. Aline, look at this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline approaches the spot where Carnby stands. She shines flashlight beam in the wiped off area. Faint Abkani symbo are carved into the wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're Abkani.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agents all start wiping away the cobwebs and dust, examining the walls for more symbols. They all shine thei beams of light through the dark space, searching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheung finds more Abkani symbols on another wall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's more over here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Agent Marko moves through the space with his lamp, his boot hits a small protrusion in the dusty ground. Agent M shines his lamp down on ground. With his boot, he pushes the dust on the ground. There's a carving on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Barr spots Marko and shines his lamp towards him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you got, Marko?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Marko presses down on the carving with his boot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the stone floor beneath Agent Marko crumbles aw revealing a deep circular Shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Marko can't hold on and he falls into the Shaft. He SCREAMS as he falls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marko!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shaft drops down sixty feet. Marko falls, unable to s his descent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Shaft walls are rough-hewn rock. Small fingers of lic grow out of the cracks in the stone. An ancient, fragile wooden ladder is imbedded directly into the rock wall, it rungs made of thick, knotted old branches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 145 The Shaft drops into a round, sand-covered room. Razor-sh spikes poke out of the loose sand beneath the Shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Marko falls directly onto the spikes. He is impaled them. 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 46 The others rush to the lip of the Shaft. They can barely the illumination of Marko's flashlight in the depths belo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to get down there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Miles surveys the defense position inside the Hall. spotlights aren't on yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Defense perimeter's up. Still waiting for the generator to come on-line.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're retrieving Marko. Keep me posted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Feenstra checks her rifle, loading in a fresh magaz She looks a little nervous, having trouble getting it to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles gently takes the rifle from Feenstra. He SLAMS the magazine in and checks the rifle. He hands it back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long do we have to hold them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only until dawn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir... that's four hours away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know.

dialogues.speaker: O
dialogues.text: n the side of a mountain rising up over Britannia Mine, Hudgens and Fischer stand watching the activity below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jagged bolts of lightning and RUMBLING THUNDER echo aroun them. The sound of HISSING comes up around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, one by one, creatures start fading into visibil behind them. More and more creatures appear, fading visib until there are dozens of xenomorph creatures stretching the mountain-side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hudgens looks back at his creature army. He lets an evil smile slip across his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All at once, the creatures start leaping down the mountainside. As they run, they all start fading invisibl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 147 Dozens of Agents in full combat gear are in position. The are armed, tense, and ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the scanner on Agent Miles' rifle starts to BEE At first, the BEEPS are spread apart. Then the BEEPS soun rapid succession, faster and faster.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Incoming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 148 Agent Miles runs up to Agent Turner. He is still tinkerin with the generator. The spotlights are still off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where the hell are the lights?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The generator's not coming on-line. They must be disrupting it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 149 Burke, and Agents Barr and Cheung lower themselves down t Shaft on zip-lines. They descend quickly and smoothly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline have to take the long way down. They carefully climb down the rungs of the ancient wooden ladd built into the Shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby steps down on a weak rung and it starts to give wa When Aline steps down on it moments later, it breaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: line starts to fall, but Carnby is there to catch her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Burke descends, he speaks into his comm-link.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got incoming! What are your orders?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold tight, Miles. Once we retrieve Marko we're coming back up. Whatever's down here is going to have to wait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a LOW RUMBLING sound above them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Small rock fragments shower down into the open mouth of t Shaft. There's a CREAKING sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The collapsed floor has triggered a trap.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the ceiling directly above the Shaft, a heavy, round s column suddenly breaks loose. More rock fragments rain do into the Shaft. 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone presses against the Shaft walls to avoid the fal rocks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stone column drops into the Shaft with a thunderous CRASH. It fits perfectly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The column starts sliding down the Shaft towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 152 In the distance, a bright flash goes off. Then another. A another. The flashes light up the landscape. The inhuman SQUEALS of the creatures can be heard in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopters all take off, hovering up into the air ab the Mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Miles and the Agents in position watch the horizon. Dozens of flashes go off in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've hit the outer perimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles' scanner is reading off the scale. It BEEPS at a frenetic pace, registering dozens of approaching creature

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Electromagnetics around the mine are off the scale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krash's voice starts to DISTORT with STATIC.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krash? Report! Krash?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the comm-link is now only giving off STATIC. 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 53 The friction from the Shaft walls is the only thing slowi the stone column's relentless descent down the Shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The weight of the column crumples the ladder as it falls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Carnby and Aline try to climb down the ladder, it is getting more and more rickety and unsteady.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke and Barr are almost at the bottom of the Shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheung is having problems with her zip-line. It keeps jamming, slowing her descent.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The floor is covered in a thick layer of fine sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke lands safely. Barr lands next to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They quickly detach their zip-lines and pull Marko's body the spikes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stone column is almost at Aline and Carnby. The ladde being ripped apart by the column. They are out of time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby grabs hold of Burke's and Barr's zip-lines, which hang loose down the Shaft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline throws her arms around Carnby's neck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby releases his tight grip on the zip-lines. Together Carnby and Aline slide down the zip-lines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline slide past Agent Cheung. She is still hovering on her jammed zip-line. But they are going too f to stop. 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke trains his rifle on the spikes. He OPENS FIRE, SHATTERING THE SPIKES. They crumble, no longer dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby and Aline drop down out of the Shaft. Carnby lets of the zip-lines and they fall to the sand by the spikes, rolling to safety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke looks up the Shaft. He sees Cheung hovering above, stone column almost at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheung! Cut the line!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The column continues to drop. It's right above Cheung.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheung pulls out a knife and cuts the zip-line cord. She drops down the rest of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 154 As Agent Cheung lands, she breaks her ankle from the impa She SCREAMS in pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke hauls Cheung out of the way at the last second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he column drops to the ground with a CRASH, totally seali

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: off the Shaft. There's no way back up.

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: he Sand Chamber is pitch black. The only light comes from their lamps and flashlights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barr wraps up Cheung's broken ankle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: line inspects the Abkani symbols carved into the walls of She lays her rifle against the wall as she reads them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Large, rough statues depicting the xenomorph creatures ha been carved directly into the rock walls of the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One wall is covered, floor to ceiling, with human skulls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby approaches Aline in front of the Abkani symbols.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a warning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby looks at the wall of human skulls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Subtle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The gist of it is, even if you make it down here alive, you're already dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke barks into his comm-link.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krash, I need another exit. Can you run a sonar pulse at this depth?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Beat. No response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Krash? Are you reading me? Miles?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't get through to Krash either. Too much interference.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use the second perimeter as your firing mark. I'll be there as soon as I find a way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the sand near Barr and Cheung, something moves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Miles and the other Agents watch the perimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold your fire until they're at the second perimeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flash-mine detonations are now much closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agents OPEN FIRE, letting loose a barrage of glowing bullets. Streaks of light fill the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 155 The THUNDERING GUNFIRE of the rotating gatling guns fills air. Thousands of glowing bullets streak through the nigh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hovering helicopters open FIRE with their side-mounte gatling guns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The on-rushing creatures SQUEAL and flash visible as the gatling guns cut into them with waves of glowing bullets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Agent Miles' scanner continues to BEEP frenetically. and more creatures continue to rush towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The automatic, ground-mounted gatling guns start running of ammunition. The sound of GUNFIRE is replaced by the HI PITCHED WHINE of the turbines rotating without bullets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopters continue to lay down suppressing FIRE, bu they are also running out of ammo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Miles and the other Agents in the Hall continue to away into the night.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ammo running low! How many of these goddamn things are there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Miles' scanner registers that waves of the creature are still quickly approaching them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 156 Cheung tests her injured ankle. She can walk with a limp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something moves through the sand towards Aline. Carnby lo over at the last moment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With a loud SQUEAL, a SAND WORM bursts out of the sand in front of Aline. At the end of its elongated body, a pair snapping jaws fold out, lined with razor-sharp teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline scrambles back and falls down. Her rifle is out of reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another sand worm bursts out of the sand, diving for Carn But he is quick on the draw. He SHOOTS the sand worm befo it can bite him. The bullets BLOW APART the sand worm's h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sand on the Chamber floor comes alive with movement a sand worms burrow towards them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agents Barr and Cheung OPEN FIRE on the sand worms. Aline fumbles for her flashlight, shining it at the sand worm. It recoils from the light and HISSES at her. The sa worm's jaws fold open, revealing its razor-sharp teeth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sand worm tries to dodge the light. It snaps at Aline with its jaws and lunges at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She grabs it by the torso, just under the snapping jaws. sand worm struggles, trying to bite Aline. She can barely hold it away from her. Her grip starts to loosen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sand worm's snapping jaws are almost at Aline's face. strains to hold it away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the sound of a GUNSHOT, the sand worm's head explode It flops to one side, dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby stands behind it, his gun smoking from the shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sand worm bursts out and chomps down on Cheung's bad fo She SCREAMS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Barr SHOOTS the worm that bit Cheung. Cheung falls back, body seizing up from its poisonous bite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cheung's body contorts. Barr grabs her as Cheung's head r back and her body goes limp. She's dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Burke turns, his face grim. He OPENS FIRE on the sand wor With precision and intensity, he FIRES controlled bursts any movement under the sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carnby FIRES along with him. After a few seconds, the movement has stopped.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aline, Carnby, Burke, and Barr stand together. They look at Cheung's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over the comm-link, Burke can hear the sounds of the BATT going on up above them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to get up there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agents FIRE streaks of glowing bullets into the night Flash-mines EXPLODE close by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A creature leaps out at Agent Miles. He spins and opens F The creature flashes visible as Miles riddles it with bullets. The creature flails around, dying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Creatures start leaping out at the Agents, jumping over t Humvee barricades and slashing at Agents with their claws The Agents STRAFE every creature they see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A creature jumps on an Agent's back and tears at him. Ano creature pounces on an Agent, ripping him open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dozens of creatures stream into the Hall. The Agents lay steady streams of fire, their glowing bullets streaking through the night. 1

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GUNFIRE echoes through the Hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: parks fly out around the generator as Agent Turner holds electrical torch to a component. Sweat drips from his forehead. He wipes his eyes clear as he works.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Turner tests to see that his electrical work is sec An Agent stand with him, ready to switch on the generator

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hit it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agent switches on the generator. It HUMS to life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he dark Hall is filled with blazing light from the batter of spotlights set up around the Entrance Hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 158 The creatures HISS and recoil from the spotlight beams. S begin smoldering under the glare.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Creatures take cover in the shadows behind old pieces of mining equipment. Most race away from the light into the darkness outside the Mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Agents continue to SHOOT into the night, BLOWING away retreating creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're turning back!

dialogues.speaker: T
dialogues.text: here's a moment of quiet. The Agents slump back, relieved The creatures are all gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to refuel and reload. We'll be back ASAP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Confirmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helicopters pull away, flying up over the mountains a past the horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Feenstra turns to Agent Miles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We made it, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles and Feenstra exchange a look of relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer appears at the end of the Platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer approaches Agent Turner and the other Agent stand at the generator. His demeanor is now totally different. is cold, menacing.

dialogues.speaker: A
dialogues.text: gent Turner turns to see Fischer approaching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a quick motion, Fischer grabs Agent Turner by the thro and hurls him out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The other Agent FIRES on Fischer with her weapon. Fischer takes a bullet in the shoulder. It doesn't stop him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer lunges for the Agent. He knocks her back and grab her face. Fischer snaps the Agent's neck, killing her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agent Turner runs towards Fischer, FIRING a sustained BUR of automatic GUNFIRE. Agent Turner's bullets rip into him but Fischer keep coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer lunges at Turner, grabbing him and SLAMMING him against the generator. Fischer SMASHES Turner in the face almost knocking him out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer tears open Turner's combat vest. Four grenades ha from the vest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ne by one, Fischer pulls the pins out of the four grenade

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turner starts to regain consciousness just in time to see this. His eyes go wide in fear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fischer hold Turner against the generator. Fischer is too strong for Turner to get away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The grenades all EXPLODE. Fischer and Turner are instantl killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The explosion ignites the generator. It EXPLODES in a crescendo of flame and sparks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: he lights go out. There is now no protection from the creatures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The spotlights are extinguished. Agent Miles and the remaining Agents turn on their rifle-mounted lamps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Miles' scanner registers dozens of signals approaching.

dialogues.speaker: A
